long_description: Say goodbye to cold toes when you're lounging around the cabin in the Woolrich Dutch Hollow slippers. The boiled wool exteriors are lined with oh-so-soft polyester faux fur for supreme warmth. Thermoplastic rubber outsoles can handle light outdoor use so you can wear your slippers to go get the newspaper or for a quick trip to the store. All-synthetic construction makes these vegan-friendly.
